name: js_accessibility_tester
description: - Using Pa11y accessibility tester - Pa11y returns an array of accessibility issues (results) of any website - Using Pa11y along with Node.js to create a simple API back-end  - Creating a front-end (with Bootstrap and Vanilla JS) to input website URL and display results returned from the API - Display loading spinner animation while Pa11y is checking - Each result displays error message, context (line of code) and error code.
